summary: Re textures the wasteland with high resolution textures
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Landscape Texture Pack WIP[/size]


===============
[size=3][color=orange]Description[/color][/size]:
===============

I was working on this for my own benefit but though I\'d upload it anyway. 
This mod re textures most of the landscape textures to 1024 or 2048 depending on your rig specs. 90% of the textures are brand new, a few are re-used from previous texture packs. This is my first texture mod and a work in progress. Hopefully I will do more when I get the time/can be arsed. The 2048 pack runs well on my oldish machine so I would go with that for you first choice.

My specs:

Core2 Quad Q6600 @ 3.0GHz
ATI Radeon r6850 Cyclone Power Edition
4GB Kingston HyperX
Crucial RealSSD C300 64GB

===============
[size=3][color=orange]Install[/color][/size]:
===============

1.) Extract.
2.) Put the folder \"textures\" into your steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data folder.
3.) Play & enjoy.

===============
[size=3][color=orange]V2.1 Update[/color][/size]:
===============

-new snow texture
-fixed snow footprints with new texture 
-fixing tiling issues on 6 textures

===============
[size=3][color=orange]Credits[/color][/size]:
===============

Thanks to gorefest2011 for his support and work for this mod
Credit for the road texture goes to chris2012


[size=3][color=red]IMPORTANT![/color][/size]
Anybody using this pack or any other pack witch adds high resolution textures should first download and install this mod:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1013]4GB Skyrim[/url]

Skyrim has issues if you increase the textures sizes beyond the default and starts to have stability issues like crashing and purple textures. This mod should solve your problems.
author: xclear - gorefest2011
